C

calculateAverageVariance(List<ImageContainer>, List<ImageContainer>, double[], double[], DescriptorType) - Method in class rf.bayesian.Bayesian
Calculates a different approximation for the variance by adding up the variance of the relevant images with the variance of the irrelevant images.
calculateDeviations(List<ImageContainer>, DescriptorType, double[]) - Static method in class rf.Utility
Calculates the deviation for every feature of a feature vector among all images in the database.
calculateMeans(List<ImageContainer>, DescriptorType) - Static method in class rf.Utility
Calculates the mean for every feature of a feature vector among all images in the database.
calculateScatterBetween(double[], double[]) - Method in class rf.bayesian.Bayesian
Calculates the value scatter between which is used to approximate the variance.
calculateScatterWithin(List<ImageContainer>, List<ImageContainer>, double[], double[], DescriptorType) - Method in class rf.bayesian.Bayesian
Calculates the scatter within, which is necessary for the approximation of the Variance.
calculateVariance(List<ImageContainer>, DescriptorType, double[]) - Static method in class rf.Utility
Calculates the variance for every feature of a feature vector among all images in the database.
cbir - package cbir
This package contains the test classes and different utility classes like the LabelUtils which are mandatory for the automation of the test-scenarios or the RFAssistant which is a helper class aimed to reduce consistency faults in the marking process.
cbir.image - package cbir.image
The image representation is contained in this package.
cbir.interfaces - package cbir.interfaces
Definitions of the different interfaces implemented in this program can be found here.
cbir.metric - package cbir.metric
All implementations of the metric interface are located in this package.
cbir.reader - package cbir.reader
This package contains very simple implementations of descriptor readers.
cbir.retriever - package cbir.retriever
In this package two implementations of image retrievers can be found.
cbir.score - package cbir.score
This package contains different implementations of the scoring functions used for the nearest neighbor relevance feedback method.
ComparatorDistanceBased - Class in cbir.retriever
This comparator uses distances to a given query image computed by a given distance metric to compare two images.
ComparatorDistanceBased(ImageContainer, Metric, DescriptorType) - Constructor for class cbir.retriever.ComparatorDistanceBased
The constructor needs the query image, a metric and the descriptortype of interest.
compare(ImageContainer, ImageContainer) - Method in class cbir.retriever.ComparatorDistanceBased
 
compareTo(int, int, ImageContainer, ImageContainer, DescriptorType) - Static method in class ind.kdtree.KDNode
Compares the values of the actual splitting coordinate of two node descriptors.
compareTo(KDNode) - Method in class ind.kdtree.KDNode
Compares the values of the actual splitting coordinate of a specified node descriptor to the actual node descriptor.
concat(double[], double[]) - Static method in class cbir.Utils
Concatenates two double arrays.
contains(ImageContainer) - Method in class ind.kdtree.KDTree
Checks whether the tree contains a specified image.
convertToWeights(List<ImageContainer>, DescriptorType, double[], double[]) - Static method in class rf.Utility
Performs the conversion from descriptors to weight vectors explained in the paper
Cosine - Class in cbir.metric
Implements the cosine metric.
Cosine() - Constructor for class cbir.metric.Cosine
 
createNode(List<ImageContainer>, int, int) - Method in class ind.kdtree.KDTree
Create a k-d-tree from a list of Images.
createRFAssistant(String) - Static method in class cbir.RFAssistant
Creates a RFAssistant object from a given file containing the known marked images.
currQuery - Static variable in class cbir.AutomatedRFTest
Contains the index of the current query.
